SEARCH
Package me.gamercoder215.socketmc.screen

Interface Positionable

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractButton, AbstractTextWidget, AbstractWidget, CheckboxButton, EditTextWidget, FocusedTextWidget, ImageButton, ImageWidget, SendInstructionButton, TextButton, TextWidget
public interface Positionable extends Serializable
Represents an object that can be positioned and rendered on the screen.
